title: International Trade and Economic Development
subtitle: Understanding Global Economics and Your Role in the World Economy
description: Understanding comparative advantage, imports/exports, tariffs/trade policies, exchange rates, globalization's impact on jobs and prices, and {{STATE_NAME}}'s role in the global economy
learning_objectives: Explain comparative advantage and why countries trade
Analyze benefits and costs of international trade (imports, exports, specialization)
Understand tariffs, quotas, and trade policies and their effects
Explain how exchange rates affect trade, travel, and investments
Assess how globalization affects your job prospects and consumer choices
Evaluate trade policies and their impact on {{STATE_NAME}} industries
Develop strategies as global consumer and worker
Understand economic development and international investment opportunities

skill_builder.title: Trade Impact Analyzer
skill_builder.description: Interactive tool to analyze how trade policies affect prices, jobs, and consumer choices in {{STATE_NAME}}
